bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XVIII (Nos 2157-2207). With a Portrait and Fourteen Plates. with contribution from C.H. Roberts and E.P. Wegener
bibl.seg: Lobel E., C.H. Roberts and E.P. Wegener, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XVIII (Nos 2157-2207). With a Portrait and Fourteen Plates. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1941, 8°, xii-215 pp. et 14 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, JRS 33 (1943) pp. 115-117. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 19 (1950) pp. 216-217. - Carlo Gallavotti, Aegyptus 22 (1942) pp. 107-116. - E. Harrison, CR 57 (1948) pp. 19-20. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 15 (1946) pp. 177-180. - S.J. Lurie, VDI 19 (1947, fasc. 1) pp. 107-112. - W.A. Oldfather and Lloyd W. Daly, AJP 65 (1944) pp. 387-393. - Orsamus M. Pearl, AJA 47 (1943) pp. 497-500. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 22 (1947) No. 43, pp. 139-142. - Verne B. Schuman, CP 48 (1953) pp. 140-141. - A. Tovar, Manuel F. Galiano y Alvaro d'Ors, Emerita 11 (1943) pp. 435-460.
